arStrings.szText: {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} chance to chain an additional time when hitting Bosses or Crowd Controlled enemies and prefers them as targets.
{c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} chance to chain an additional time when hitting Bosses or Crowd Controlled enemies and prefers them as targets.
